##### How are you feeling?

##### The million-dollar question

How many **pieces** in total make up the classic magic cube invented by Ernő Rubik?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=GSd66EnQjms

German RTL Show »Who Wants to be a Millionaire?« from 12/07/15

##### Distance between earth and moon

![Größenverhältnis Erde zu Mond](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/f/f6/Moon_Earth_Comparison.png)

Estimate the mean distance between earth and moon in whole earth diameters $ø_{earth}$!

$ø_{Erde} = 12,756 $ km

$ø_{Mond} = 3,476$ km

---

Source: [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Moon)

##### Set $\pi$ to two decimal places! 

![Kreiszahl Pi](https://upload.wikimedia.org/wikipedia/commons/2/2a/Pi-unrolled-720.gif)

---

Leonhard Euler: 

$$e^{i \pi} +1 = 0$$

Karl Weierstraß:

$$\pi = \int_{-\infty}^\infty \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{1 + x^2} = 2\cdot \int_{-1}^1 \frac{\mathrm{d} x}{1 + x^2}$$
